COMPANY_INFO.NAME: SADAL CLEAN
COMPANY_INFO.DESCRIPTION_FULL: SADAL CLEAN is a cleaning company based in Wesley Chapel, Florida, dedicated to providing professional, reliable, and detailed services. We offer residential, commercial, office, and deep cleaning. Our focus is on quality, punctuality, and trust with every client.
COMPANY_INFO.FOCUS_STATEMENT: Our focus is on quality, punctuality, and trust with every client.

HOME_PAGE.HERO_SUBTITLE: Professional, reliable, and detailed cleaning for your home and office in Wesley Chapel, FL.

WELCOME_SECTION.TITLE: Your Trusted Cleaning Partner in Wesley Chapel

CTA_SECTION.TITLE: Ready for a Spotless Space?
CTA_SECTION.TEXT: Let SadalClean take care of the cleaning so you can focus on what matters most. Contact us today for a free, no-obligation quote!

SERVICES_PAGE_CONTENT.PAGE_SUBTITLE: Discover our range of professional cleaning solutions tailored to your needs.

RESIDENTIAL.TITLE: Residential Cleaning
RESIDENTIAL.DETAIL: Detailed cleaning of houses and apartments. Includes bathrooms, kitchens, living rooms, bedrooms, and more.

COMMERCIAL.TITLE: Commercial Cleaning
COMMERCIAL.DETAIL: For stores, shops, and commercial spaces. Regular or deep cleaning based on your needs.

OFFICE.TITLE: Office Cleaning
OFFICE.DETAIL: Keep your office clean and disinfected. Ideal for organized and productive workspaces.

DEEP_CLEANING.TITLE: Deep Cleaning
DEEP_CLEANING.DETAIL: Intensive cleaning in every corner. Perfect for moving, seasonal cleanups, or post-renovation.

ABOUT_US_PAGE.PAGE_HEADER_SUBTITLE: Learn more about our dedication to cleanliness and customer satisfaction.
ABOUT_US_PAGE.VALUE_QUALITY_TEXT: We are committed to delivering the highest standard of cleaning with attention to every detail.
ABOUT_US_PAGE.VALUE_PUNCTUALITY_TEXT: Your time is valuable. We pride ourselves on being on time and dependable for every appointment.
ABOUT_US_PAGE.VALUE_TRUST_TEXT: We build lasting relationships based on transparency, integrity, and consistent results.
ABOUT_US_PAGE.MISSION_TEXT: To provide exceptional cleaning services that create healthy, comfortable, and productive environments for our clients in Wesley Chapel and surrounding areas.
ABOUT_US_PAGE.VISION_TEXT: To be the leading and most trusted cleaning service provider in our community, recognized for our excellence, reliability, and customer-centric approach.
ABOUT_US_PAGE.CTA_TITLE: Ready to Experience the SADAL CLEAN Difference?
ABOUT_US_PAGE.CTA_TEXT: Let us take care of your cleaning needs with professionalism and care.

GALLERY_PAGE.GALLERY_INTRO: See the quality of our work for yourself. Here are some examples of our cleaning services.
GALLERY_PAGE.TESTIMONIAL_1_TEXT: "SADAL CLEAN did an amazing job! My house has never been cleaner." - A Happy Client (Please provide actual testimonials)
